How to reset Password?
knowledgeBase.answer:
Follow the below steps:
1. Go to the login page.
2. Click on the 'Forgot Password' link.
3. Enter your email address.
4. Check your email for a password reset link.
5. Click on the link reset password and follow the instructions to reset your password.

knowledgeBase.question: Self service password reset (SSPR)
knowledgeBase.answer:
1. Open the web browser on your device and go to the password reset registration page. ssprsetup
2. Enter your ICS Login ID/ Username (Ex- birupakhyad@infinite.com).
3. You will be redirected to the ICS Azure portal login page.
4. Input your current or assigned password.
5. You should have at least one additional method configured.
6. It is recommended, but not required, that you set up as many methods as you can.
7. This gives you flexibility when one of the methods isn't available.
8. Alternative Authentication Phone (call or text): A number other than your office phone
9. Alternative Authentication Email: An email other than your work email
